title: Ariel Adams (A Blog to Watch)
description:
Ariel Adams is the editor of ablogtowatch.com, a website covering all things watches. We talk about  cars, watches, how to choose a nice watch, what separates the brands, human behavior, and a lot more. Follow Ariel's work at:

@ablogtowatch

https://www.ablogtowatch.com/

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping.

 

Raycon’s offering 15% off all their products for [Smoking Tire] listeners: go to BuyRaycon.com/smoking.

 

JB Weld: Available at JBWeld.com, Walmart, Amazon, Home Depot, Lowe's, AutoZone, Advance Auto Parts, NAPA, O'Reilly, Michael's, and more.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
